code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminDashboard=_ref=>{let{token}=_ref;const[results,setResults]=useState({});const fetchResults=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("/results",{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setResults(res.data);}catch(error){alert("Failed to fetch results.");}};useEffect(()=>{fetchResults();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Live Voting Results"}),Object.keys(results).length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:Object.entries(results).map(_ref2=>{let[candidate,count]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[candidate,": ",count," votes"]},candidate);})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No votes yet."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchResults,children:"Refresh Results"})]});};export default AdminDashboard;
